meanings.definition: Lasting for a period of ten years.
meanings.sent1: The decadelong study showed how things changed over ten years.
meanings.sent2: The decadelong project finally came to an end after a decade of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The decadelong wait for the new video game felt like forever!
meanings.sent4: Her decadelong commitment to the charity was truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The decadelong drought devastated the crops and the farmers.

meanings.sent1: The decadelong celebration of the town's founding brought everyone together.
meanings.sent2: The decadelong tradition of hosting a summer fair was loved by all.
meanings.sent3: The decadelong party was the talk of the town!
meanings.sent4: His decadelong journey to self-discovery finally reached its destination.
meanings.sent5: The decadelong friendship between the two neighbors was unbreakable.
